title: Breakingviews TV: Chip Meltdown
text:
Breakingviews TV: Chip Meltdown 12:58pm EST - 04:31 
Liam Proud and Richard Beales discuss the recently discovered security flaws – dubbed Meltdown and Spectre – in computer processors made by Intel, ARM and AMD and what they reveal about the riskiness of a concentrated market for the brains of our digital devices.   
Liam Proud and Richard Beales discuss the recently discovered security flaws – dubbed Meltdown and Spectre – in computer processors made by Intel, ARM and AMD and what they reveal about the riskiness of a concentrated market for the brains of our digital devices.  //reut.rs/2CF0Sq3
